app.title: Test app!
app.description: Run your app and go to {link}. By default it shows the app hosted on port 5174, but you can change it by going to /developer/:port.

queryParams.title: query params
queryParams.description: Change the query params in the URL to receive them in the app

selectSbs.title: Select SBS
selectSbs.description: Select an SBS item to be shown and highlighted in the notepad

selectTask.title: Select Task
selectTask.description: Select a task to be shown in the notepad

notepad.title: Notepad
notepad.description: Open a certain tab in the notepad

overlay.title: Overlay
overlay.description: Show the task as a workflow

navigateTo.title: Navigate to
navigateTo.description: Open a specific page or other app through an app
